questions.question: Ry conducts an experiment.Shay wants to do it.What should happen for the results to be the same

choices.answer: Some of the conditions must be the same.
All of the conditions must be the same.
None of the conditions can be the same.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a metric measuring unit?
Chris did an experiment at home many times.If he did it with the class what is likely to happen

choices.answer: He will probably get the same results
He will get entirely different results
The experiment will not work at all
Only part of the experiement will work

questions.question: Which of the following phrases BEST describes a model?

choices.answer: a representation of a real object

questions.question: Which representation would be best to use for comparing the speeds of 2 toy race cars?
When is an estimation used during a scientific investigation?

choices.answer: when you can't find a ruler
when you conduct the experiment only one time
when exact measurements are not possible

questions.question: Which of the following BEST describes the term collaboration?

choices.answer: working together to reach, explain, and justify conclusions
working alone to record accurate information
working in a science lab independently
working on a special project alone

questions.question: What determines the kind of investigation scientists use?

choices.answer: the amount of data that is avaliable
the questions they are trying to answer
how much money has been allocated

questions.question: Bella wanted to find out if temperature affected mold growth on bread, what should she do?
Which of the following terms best describes a quantity such as time length distance or mass
Which of the following is NOT involved in a scientific investigation
Which of the following terms describes the factors that are kept constant during an experiement
Wills teacher conducted an experiemetn 3 times and got the same results will was asked to infer

choices.answer: provide an explanation of information based on facts
